full_summary:
**Promotion of a Government Tender Announcement**
=============================================

**Project Information**
-------------------

*   **Project Title (English/French):** Rope Cable Chain and Fittings/Corde Câble Chaîne et Raccords
*   **Contract Information:**
    *   **Reference Number (English/French):** PW-22-01003613/numéro de référence PW-22-01003613
    *   **Tender Closing Date and Time:** September 9, 2022, at 14:00:00 UTC-4
    *   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services/Goods and Services
    *   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding/Procédure concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
*   **Contractor Information:**
    *   **Contracting Entity (English/French):** Department of National Defence/Ministère de la défense nationale
    *   **Contact Information:**
        *   **Contact Name (English/French):** Drescher, Katerina/Drescher, Katerina
        *   **Email (English/French):** katerina.drescher@forces.gc.ca/katerina.drescher@forces.gc.ca
        *   **Address (English/French):** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada/101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, QC K1A 0K2, Canada

**Products and Services**
-----------------------

The Department of National Defence requires the delivery of various rope cable chain and fittings items for multiple locations. Below is a detailed list of the products and services required:

*   **Article 1:**
    +   Description: Chain or Cable
    +   Quantity: 12 Units
    +   Unit of Issue: EA
    +   Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

*   **Article 2 to 8:**
    +   Description: Various rope cable chain and fittings items
    +   Quantity: 6-12 Units
    +   Unit of Issue: EA
    +   Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

*   **Trade Agreements:** *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   **Trade Agreements:** *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
